idea: Droneage Technologies, is a Drone Survey company in India specializing in professional Aerial Photography services in the areas of Drone surveying, Land Mapping, GIS Surveying, Topographic Survey, Drone Inspection, Infrastructure Monitoring, Mining Services, Agricultural Drones, Forest Managemnt & Disaster Management.
name: DRONEAGE TECHNOLOGIES PVT.LTD.

idea:
Ankur Jadhav Photography - Website


Ankur is an editorial and commercial photographer & filmmaker based in Mumbai, India. He's been working with diverse people and organizations like musicians, startups, executives and corporates since 2013.

​

His passion to photograph and film the sub-cultures of cities and towns has played an influential part to face the creative challenges in unpredictable situations that come in the journey. Also, It has deeply influenced his outlook on visual storytelling.

​

His worldview of creating visual art comes from his deep roots as a performer of Indian classical vocal music.
name: Ankur Jadhav Photography
